Literature.Title: Mimicry of a Non-ribosomally Produced Antimicrobial, Brevicidine, by Ribosomal Synthesis and Post-translational Modification.
Literature.Author: Zhao X, Li Z, Kuipers OP

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Xanthomonas campestris pv. campestris NCCB 92058(MIC=32µM),Acinetobacter baumannii LMG 01041(MIC=256µM),Escherichia coli LMG 8223(MIC=128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=256µM)
